TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem

summary.span: 表示包含文本和图像的可选的 。

span.span: Represents a selectable that can contain text and images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 创建支持文本和图像的工具栏按钮。Use to create a toolbar button that supports both text and images. 使用 和 属性可获取或设置 图像和文本的位置。Use the and properties to get or set the positioning of images and text. 您可以 使用各种边框样式显示，并可以使用它来表示和激活操作状态。You can display a with various border styles, and you can use it to represent and activate operational states. 你还可以将其定义为默认情况下具有焦点。You can also define it to have the focus by default. 尽管 替换并扩展了 以前版本的控制，但仍 保留以实现向后兼容性和将来使用。Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两个 控件，其中包含图像和文本 。The following code example shows two controls with both image and text on a . 单击 "**新建**" 将 显示一个消息框。Clicking the **New** displays a message box. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton/cs/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton/vb/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `true` ，并使用 事件中的属性在 单击按钮时将按钮文本的字体更改为粗体。The following code example sets the property to `true` and uses the property in a event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripButton1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripButton1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#568](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#568)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#568](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#568)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
